ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/AnnArborStagingClassification
CodeDisplayDefinition
stage_11 (A, B el. E)Stage 1: Involvement of a single lymph node region or of a single extralymphatic organ or site
stage_22 (A, B el. E)Stage 2: Involvement of two or more lymph node regions on the same side of the diaphragm or localized involvement of an extralymphatic organ or site
stage_33 (A, B el. E)Stage 3: Involvement of lymph node regions or structures on both sides of the diaphragm
stage_44 (A, B el. E)Stage 4: diffuse or disseminated involvement of one or more extralymphatic organs, or either: - isolated extralymphatic organ involvement without adjacent regional lymph node involvement, but with disease in distant sites - involvement of the liver, bone marrow, pleura or cerebrospinal fluid

publisher.value: Sundhedsvæsenets Kvalitetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

name.value: Sundhedsvæsenets Kvalitetsinstitut with Trifork Digital Health A/S

description.value: Ann Arbor er en gradering klassifikation til Hodgkins desease
